attributes.action: Enshrine into law, corporations must pay in full the UK taxes they owe each year
attributes.additional_details: MPs to enshrine into law, cessation of right to conduct business activity for any corporation which does not pay in full all corporation tax monies owed to the treasury each year. No excuses to be accepted nor amnesties offered.
attributes.background: The British people are fed up with our critical national institutions and services being cut and sold off in the name of ideological austerity. We regular citizens must, and do, pay tax on ALL of the money we earn. Big business must pay what it owes to the treasury each year, too. Fair and square.
